entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a teacher who flared her nostrils and gave instructions to other teachers. She is described as 'whose nostrils were flared'.

entities.name: heads of houses
entities.description: The Heads of Houses are mentioned as a group that should inform their students about the situation. They are not explicitly named but referred to as a collective entity.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as one of the students who sat in the Gryffindor common room with Ron, Fred, and George. He is described as unable to say anything to his friends.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who sat in the Gryffindor common room with him, Fred, and George. He is described as unable to say anything to his friends.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who sat in the Gryffindor common room with him, Ron, and George. He went up to bed unable to sit there any longer.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who sat in the Gryffindor common room with him, Ron, and Fred. He went up to bed unable to sit there any longer.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who was not present in the Gryffindor common room. He had gone to send an owl to Mr and Mrs Weasley.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is mentioned as Percy's father whom Percy sent an owl to inform about the situation.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as Mr Weasley's wife whom Percy sent an owl to inform about the situation.
